content.question: Which of the following best achieves the goal of providing wood products for humans while preserving biodiversity?

choices.label: Clear-cutting of large areas of old-growth forest
Selective cutting of large areas of old-growth forest
Using prescribed burns in large areas of old-growth forest
Planting large tree plantations in abandoned farm fields

content.answer: Selective cutting of large areas of old-growth forest

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
